snippet: Amazon plans to build two large distribution centers in New Jersey and will start collecting state sales tax next summer from its customers in the state, Gov. Chris Christie announced.
abstract: Online retailer Amazon plans to build two large distribution centers in New Jersey and will start collecting state sales tax from in-state customers; move is an attempt to address complaints by retailers based in New Jersey who say they are at competitive pricing disadvantage because they must charge sales tax.
lead_paragraph: Amazon plans to build two large distribution centers in New Jersey and will start collecting state sales tax next summer from its customers in the state, Gov. Chris Christie announced.

headline.seo: Amazon to Build Warehouses and Collect Sales Tax in New Jersey
headline.main: Amazon to Build New Jersey Warehouses and Collect State Tax
headline.print_headline: Amazon to Build New Jersey Warehouses and Collect State Tax
